item.title: Podman rootless containers in RHEL7
item.description: Quick howto to make podman rootless containers work in RHEL7: sudo yum clean all sudo yum update -y sudo yum install slirp4netns podman -y echo "user.max_user_namespaces=28633" | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.d/userns.conf sudo sysctl -p /etc/sysctl.d/userns.conf sudo usermod --add-subuids 200000-300000 --add-subgids 200000-300000 $(whoami) podman system migrate Then, logout and log-in again. Easy peasy!
